name: Classic Roast Chicken
description: The ideal roast chicken – a wondrous aroma, golden-brown and gleaming, tender, and juicy.
preparation: Place whole chicken in a roasting pan.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with Roast Chicken Seasoning.
Roast for 90 minutes, basting occasionally, until juice runs clear. The breast temperature should read 180° F (82° C) and the thigh should read 190° F (88° C).
Cover and allow to rest for 15 minutes before carving.
tips: Cook two chickens or a larger whole chicken if you want leftovers.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with prepared Sage & Apple Stuffing, Savoury Herb Gravy and pre-cut, fresh, in-season vegetables cooked in a Rectangular Steamer for fewer pots on the stove!
